metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20549 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
There is an illegal WRITE memory access at caca/file.c (function caca_file_read) in libcaca 0.99.beta19.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20549` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

caca-utils - 0.99.beta19-2ubuntu0.16.04.1
libcaca0 - 0.99.beta19-2ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libcaca package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.99.beta19-2ubuntu0.16.04.1').
